midas/mscb/calib_hvr.c

00042 #include <windows.h>
00043 #include <stdio.h>
00044 #include <string.h>
00045 #include <stdlib.h>
00046 #include <math.h>
00047 #include "mscb.h"
00048 
00049 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 
00051 #define CH_CONTROL      0
00052 #define CH_VDEMAND      1
00053 #define CH_VMEAS        2
00054 #define CH_IMEAS        3
00055 #define CH_STATUS       4
00056 #define CH_TRIPCNT      5
00057 #define CH_RAMPUP       6
00058 #define CH_RAMPDOWN     7
00059 #define CH_VLIMIT       8
00060 #define CH_ILIMIT       9
00061 #define CH_TRIPMAX     10
00062 #define CH_ADCGAIN     11
00063 #define CH_ADCOFS      12
00064 #define CH_DACGAIN     13
00065 #define CH_DACOFS      14
00066 #define CH_CURGAIN     15
00067 #define CH_CUROFS      16
00068 #define CH_TEMP        17
00069 
00070 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00071 
00072 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00073 {
00074    float f;
00075    int fd, adr, size, d;
00076    char str[80];
00077    float v_adc1, v_adc2, v_multi1, v_multi2,
00078        adc_gain, adc_ofs, dac_gain, dac_ofs, i1, i2, i_gain, i_ofs;
00079    MSCB_INFO_VAR info;
00080 
00081    /* open port */
00082    *str = 0;
00083    fd = mscb_init(str, sizeof(str), 0);
00084    if (fd < 0) {
00085       if (str[0])
00086          printf("Cannot connect to device \"%s\".\n", str);
00087       else
00088          printf("No MSCB submaster found.\n");
00089 
00090       return 0;
00091    }
00092 
00093    printf("Enter address of HVR-200 device: ");
00094    fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
00095    adr = atoi(str);
00096 
00097    if (mscb_ping(fd, adr) != MSCB_SUCCESS) {
00098       printf("No device at address %d found.\n", adr);
00099       return 0;
00100    }
00101 
00102    mscb_info_variable(fd, adr, CH_TEMP, &info);
00103    memset(str, 0, sizeof(str));
00104    memcpy(str, info.name, 8);
00105    if (strcmp(str, "Temp") != 0) {
00106       printf("Incorrect software versionon HVR-200. Expect \"Temp\" on var #%d.\n",
00107              CH_TEMP);
00108       return 0;
00109    }
00110 
00111    /* check temperature */
00112    size = sizeof(float);
00113    mscb_read(fd, adr, CH_TEMP, &f, &size);
00114    if (f < 0 || f > 50) {
00115       printf("Incorrect temperature reading %1.1lf. Check reference voltage and AGND.\n");
00116       return 0;
00117    }
00118 
00119    printf("Calibrate voltage ([y]/n) ? ");
00120    fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
00121 
00122    if (str[0] != 'n') {
00123 
00124       printf("\nPlease connect multimeter with 1000V range to output,\n");
00125       printf("connect 1300V to input and press ENTER\n");
00126       fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
00127 
00128       /* init variables */
00129       f = 0;
00130       d = 0;
00131       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_VDEMAND, &f, sizeof(float));
00132       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_ADCOFS, &f, sizeof(float));
00133       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_DACOFS, &f, sizeof(float));
00134       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_RAMPUP, &d, sizeof(short));
00135       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_RAMPDOWN, &d, sizeof(short));
00136 
00137       f = 1;
00138       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_ADCGAIN, &f, sizeof(float));
00139       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_DACGAIN, &f, sizeof(float));
00140 
00141       /* set current limit to 3mA */
00142       f = 3000;
00143       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_ILIMIT, &f, sizeof(float));
00144 
00145       /* set demand to 100V */
00146       f = 100;
00147       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_VDEMAND, &f, sizeof(float));
00148 
00149       /* set CSR to HV on, no regulation */
00150       d = 1;
00151       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_CONTROL, &d, 1);
00152 
00153       printf("Please enter voltage from multimeter: ");
00154       fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
00155       v_multi1 = (float) fabs(atof(str));
00156 
00157       /* read ADC */
00158       size = sizeof(float);
00159       mscb_read(fd, adr, CH_VMEAS, &v_adc1, &size);
00160 
00161       printf("HVR-200 ADC reads %1.1lf Volt\n", v_adc1);
00162 
00163       if (v_adc1 < 50) {
00164          printf("HVR-200 ADC voltage too low, aborting.\n");
00165          return 0;
00166       }
00167 
00168       /* set demand to 900V */
00169       f = 900;
00170       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_VDEMAND, &f, sizeof(float));
00171 
00172       printf("Please enter voltage from multimeter: ");
00173       fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
00174       v_multi2 = (float) fabs(atof(str));
00175 
00176       /* read ADC */
00177       size = sizeof(float);
00178       mscb_read(fd, adr, CH_VMEAS, &v_adc2, &size);
00179 
00180       printf("HVR-200 ADC reads %1.1lf\n", v_adc2);
00181 
00182       if (v_adc2 < 500) {
00183          printf("HVR-200 ADC voltage too low, aborting.\n");
00184          return 0;
00185       }
00186 
00187       /* calculate corrections */
00188       dac_gain = (float) ((900.0 - 100.0) / (v_multi2 - v_multi1));
00189       dac_ofs = (float) (100 - dac_gain * v_multi1);
00190 
00191       adc_gain = (float) ((v_multi2 - v_multi1) / (v_adc2 - v_adc1));
00192       adc_ofs = (float) (v_multi1 - adc_gain * v_adc1);
00193 
00194       printf("\n\nCalculated calibration constants:\n");
00195       printf("DAC gain:   %1.5lf\n", dac_gain);
00196       printf("DAC offset: %1.5lf\n", dac_ofs);
00197       printf("ADC gain:   %1.5lf\n", adc_gain);
00198       printf("ADC offset: %1.5lf\n", adc_ofs);
00199 
00200       printf("\nWrite values to flash? ([y]/n) ");
00201       fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
00202       if (str[0] == 'n') {
00203          printf("Calibration aborted.\n");
00204          return 0;
00205       }
00206 
00207       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_ADCGAIN, &adc_gain, sizeof(float));
00208       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_ADCOFS, &adc_ofs, sizeof(float));
00209       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_DACGAIN, &dac_gain, sizeof(float));
00210       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_DACOFS, &dac_ofs, sizeof(float));
00211 
00212       /* remove voltage */
00213       f = 0;
00214       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_VDEMAND, &f, sizeof(float));
00215 
00216       /* write constants to EEPROM */
00217       mscb_flash(fd, adr);
00218    }
00219 
00220    printf("Calibrate current ([y]/n) ? ");
00221    fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
00222 
00223    if (str[0] != 'n') {
00224 
00225       /* init variables */
00226       f = 0;
00227       d = 0;
00228       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_RAMPUP, &d, sizeof(short));
00229       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_RAMPDOWN, &d, sizeof(short));
00230       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_CUROFS, &f, sizeof(float));        /* CURofs  */
00231       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_VDEMAND, &f, sizeof(float));
00232 
00233       f = 1;
00234       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_CURGAIN, &f, sizeof(float));       /* CURgain */
00235 
00236       /* set current limit to 3mA */
00237       f = 3000;
00238       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_ILIMIT, &f, sizeof(float));
00239 
00240       /* set CSR to HV on, no regulation */
00241       d = 1;
00242       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_CONTROL, &d, 1);
00243 
00244       printf("\nPlease connect 1MOhm resistor to output,\n");
00245       printf("connect 1300V to input and press ENTER\n");
00246       fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
00247 
00248       /* set demand to 100V */
00249       f = 100;
00250       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_VDEMAND, &f, sizeof(float));
00251 
00252       /* wait voltage to settle */
00253       Sleep(3000);
00254 
00255       /* read current */
00256       size = sizeof(float);
00257       mscb_read(fd, adr, CH_IMEAS, &i1, &size);
00258       printf("Current at 100V: %1.1lf uA\n", i1);
00259 
00260       do {
00261          /* set demand to 900V */
00262          f = 900;
00263          mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_VDEMAND, &f, sizeof(float));
00264 
00265          /* wait voltage to settle */
00266          Sleep(3000);
00267 
00268          /* read voltage */
00269          size = sizeof(float);
00270          mscb_read(fd, adr, CH_VMEAS, &v_adc1, &size);
00271 
00272          if (v_adc1 < 890) {
00273             v_adc2 = 900 - v_adc1 + 100;
00274             v_adc2 = (float) ((int) (v_adc2 / 100.0) * 100);
00275 
00276             printf("Only %1.1lf V can be reached on output,\n", v_adc1);
00277             printf("please increase input voltage by %1.0lf V and press ENTER.\n",
00278                    v_adc2);
00279             fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
00280          }
00281 
00282       } while (v_adc1 < 890);
00283 
00284       /* read current */
00285       size = sizeof(float);
00286       mscb_read(fd, adr, CH_IMEAS, &i2, &size);
00287       printf("Current at 900V: %1.1lf uA\n", i2);
00288 
00289       /* calculate corrections */
00290       i_gain = (float) ((900 - 100) / (i2 - i1));
00291       i_ofs = (float) (100 - i_gain * i1);
00292 
00293       printf("\n\nCalculated calibration constants:\n");
00294       printf("I gain:   %1.5lf\n", i_gain);
00295       printf("I offset: %1.5lf\n", i_ofs);
00296 
00297       if (i_ofs > 0) {
00298          printf
00299              ("\nWARNING: The current offset is positive, which means that a current\n");
00300          printf
00301              ("below %1.0lfuA cannot be measured. A compensation resistor to Vref is missing.\n\n",
00302               i_ofs);
00303       }
00304 
00305       printf("\nWrite values to flash? ([y]/n) ");
00306       fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
00307       if (str[0] == 'n') {
00308          printf("Calibration aborted.\n");
00309          return 0;
00310       }
00311 
00312       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_CURGAIN, &i_gain, sizeof(float));
00313       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_CUROFS, &i_ofs, sizeof(float));
00314 
00315       /* remove voltage */
00316       f = 0;
00317       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_VDEMAND, &f, sizeof(float));
00318       d = 2;
00319       mscb_write(fd, adr, CH_CONTROL, &d, 1);
00320 
00321       /* write constants to EEPROM */
00322       mscb_flash(fd, adr);
00323    }
00324 
00325    printf("\nCalibration finished.\n");
00326 
00327    mscb_exit(fd);
00328 
00329    return 0;
00330 }
